Budget Plan

Trying to become an astronaut on a budget? This plan is as bare-bones as they come, cutting any expenses that would add extra dollars to your trip. It may not be as luxurious, but it gets the job done for $1,000,000.

Contact for Purchase

Deluxe Package

The Astrocruise Deluxe Package is our most extravagant and luxurious trip plan available. This plan will provide you with the most amazing conditions you could ask for. The best food, the most comfortable quarters, and a complementary bottle of champagne at the ring of a bell. With all that and more, as long as you're willing to spend a few extra dollars, the Deluxe Package can be yours for the price of $4,000,000.

Contact for Purchase

Family Plan

The family plan includes everything you might need for a group of 3-5. Food and toiletries are all taken care of so you and your family can enjoy the beauty of the cosmos. for a low price of $3,000,000.

Contact for Purchase
